articles.description: America isn't quite back. Europe isn't that united. Brexit still isn't done. There was a lot riding on the Group of Seven summit, and a fair few telling moments came out of it.

articles.title: Netherlands edge out Ukraine in five-goal thriller - SuperSport
articles.description: Flying full back Denzel Dumfries scored a late winner to earn the Netherlands a 3-2 victory over Ukraine in a thrilling Group C opener at the European Championship on Sunday.
